name: SinglePass Curl X 1.5” Ceramic Extra-Long Barrel Curling Iron
about: What it is:A professional 1.5 curling iron featuring an extra-long barrel and Digital T3 SinglePass® Technology for fast, one-pass styling with lasting results..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Volumizing.Key Benefits:- 1.5 Clip Barrel: Creates soft, lived-in curls and waves with a smooth, glossy finish.What Else You Need to Know:This curling iron’s extra-long barrel and ProGlide clip design team up to style wide sections, long hair, or hard-to-reach areas in one quick, smooth pass. Digital T3 SinglePass® Technology ensures perfect heat precision—no hot or cool spots—for curls and waves that last.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Clamp the ends of a one- to two-inch section of hair and roll up toward the roots. Hold for a few seconds, then release.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: T3 SinglePass Curl X has an extra long barrel making hard to reach areas easier to curl and allows you to curl larger sections too. This has 9 different heat settings at the turn of a dial. With my medium hair I use setting 3-4 but I can go up as high as 6. The tip remains cool for easy control. It’s lightweight. Auto shut off after one hour in case you forget to turn it off. The cord swivels 360 degrees so you don’t get tangled and irritated lol. And it’s traveling friendly being auto world voltage.  I love this makes curling the back of my head so much easier and quicker.
